OverlayTriggerProps.name: beforeHide
OverlayTriggerProps.description:
The callback to run before the overlay is hidden. Returning false will prevent hiding.
(e: event) => boolean | Promise | undefined

OverlayTriggerProps.name: beforeShow
OverlayTriggerProps.description:
The callback to run before the overlay is shown. Returning false will prevent showing.
(e: event) => boolean | Promise | undefined

OverlayTriggerProps.name: clickOutsideIgnoreRefs
OverlayTriggerProps.description: Additional refs to check for clickOutside behavior

OverlayTriggerProps.name: hideDelay
OverlayTriggerProps.description: The delay when hiding the overlay

OverlayTriggerProps.name: restoreFocusOnHide
OverlayTriggerProps.description: Restore focus to the target after the overlay is hidden

OverlayTriggerProps.name: showDelay
OverlayTriggerProps.description: The delay when showing the overlay

OverlayTriggerProps.name: showKeys
OverlayTriggerProps.description: Keys to show the overlay when the target is focused
